IntroText: Hello. You must be the new girl.|I'm Erica and these are today's slaves.
Can I interest you in a slave?|I only trade the finest specimens.
It's kind of hard for them to ask when they|have already been kidnapped, bound and gagged.
Kidnapping and Slavery are|active parts of this club.
So are you interest in slaves.
Have you considered getting|into slavery by kidnapping?
You should try kidnapping.
Jenna left a bag of manacle sets by the other door.|You could use them sercure your slaves.
You should concentrating on|kidnapping your own slaves.
Come back when you ready to wear this.
What's this, has another helpless damsel|strayed into the slavers domain?
Looks whose back. Are you|ready to become my slave now?
Just kidnapping a helpless damsel.|(Erica removes your blindfold.)
Sorry cutie, your a just my slave now.|(Erica removes your blindfold.)
You'll make a cute slave.|(Erica removes your blindfold.)
Nice try, but you picked the wrong fight too loose.|You're my slave now.
I though I told you to go away.
(You have Erica at your mercy,|but she still struggles to escape your grip.)
(What will you do to her now?)
(Erica is helpless, but there is not|much you can do about that now.)
(Erica watches at you nervously.  She won't|trouble you any more, but is best left alone for now.)
